_header: My worshipful and reverent lady dear
Subjects: love letters; love, unrequited; lovers, death of; lovers, verses addressed to
_description: An Epistle to his mistress by Humfrey Newton — seventeen quatrains

BodLatMisC66.First Lines:
My worshipfull & reuerent lady dere& ye that all my lof us
                    on…
BodLatMisC66.Last Lines:
…of my dethe I you enditeallas for lofe my lif is
                    lore
BodLatMisC66.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “The Poems of Humphrey Newton, Esquire, 1466-1536.” 
             PMLA
         65 (1950): 249-81: 260-2.
